title: in the case of villages in Regional Plan of Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Raigad, such distance shall be 500 m
clause_text: in the case of villages in Regional Plan of Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Raigad, such distance shall be 500 m. only.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: in the case of villages in Regional Plan of Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Raigad, such distance shall be 500 m. only.
